title: Social Media Cheat Sheet 24'
description: Mastering the Contrast Adapting Social Media Sizes ( Instagram, Facebook, Linkedin, Youtube, X )

body.raw:
<Callout>

This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page, it means I'm still working on it. You can follow updates on Twitter [@aliimam_in](https://twitter.com/aliimam_in).

</Callout>

---

## Instagram

##### Posts
